alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Greene; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 6:47AM EDT until April 08 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Penfield affecting Greene, Oconee and Clarke Counties. Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Washington, Wilkinson and Baldwin Counties. Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Jones, Houston, Bibb, Monroe and Twiggs Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and forecast to continue. * WHERE...Oconee River near Penfield. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Minor flooding continues to expand into fields...woodlands and pastures...mainly on the right bank of the river...upstream and downstream from the gage on the Georgia Highway 15 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 14.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 13 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
